welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rossington, a charming town known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the local culture during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Business Terminal
terminals.description: The business terminal at Robin Hood Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but a valid military or civilian ID is required to access it.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Humaita Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
